amendment.description: An amendment numbered 40 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to prohibit funds in this act from being used for financial assistance in contravention of section 642 (a) of the Illegal Immigration Reform and Immigrant Responsibility Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.
